nl_problem:
# Task: Nested Logic Test (Depth 1)
# Interface:
Class: Solution
Method: checkNested(self, x0: int) -> bool

# Objective:
This is a test of structural nesting. Return True ONLY if all the following conditions are met:
1. x0 is greater than 0

Each condition must be checked inside the previous one (nested if statements).
lisp_spec:
(task
 (name "checkNested")
 (signature ( (self) (x0 int) ) bool)
 (constraints
   (constraint "x0 must be an integer.")
 )
 (goal
   (description "Check if x0 is greater than 0.")
   (rule "Return True only if x0 is greater than 0; otherwise, return False.")
   (return "Returns True if x0 > 0, otherwise False.")
 )
)
generated_code:
class Solution:
    def checkNested(self, x0: int) -> bool:
        """
        Check if x0 is greater than 0.

        Args:
            x0 (int): The integer to check.

        Returns:
            bool: True if x0 > 0, otherwise False.
        """
        if not isinstance(x0, int):
            raise ValueError("x0 must be an integer.")
        return x0 > 0
